description.text:
This cloak looks like the skin of a goblin dog, including legs and tail; the clasp is a goblin dog's tooth. The wearer gains a +2 competence bonus on Intimidate checks.
If the wearer's patron is one of the goblin barghest hero gods (Hadregash, Venkelvore, Zarongel, or Zogmugot), once per day the wearer can use polymorph to transform into a goblin dog for up to 7 minutes.
